SummaryEnglish: Uta Sakura, is a second-year middle school student who loves to sing. One day, she meets the fairy Purirun that has come to search for the Legendary Protectors, Idol Pretty Cure! Purirun's hometown, KirakiLand has been plunged into total darkness by Darkine, the boss of the Chokkiri Gang. Meanwhile, the sparkles of the townspeople are being stolen by the Chokkiri Gang... it's a huge pinch! "I want to make it sparkle sparkly! Here is my song!" With this determination, Uta transforms into the Legendary Warrior, Cure Idol! She sings, dances, and gives fan service, making it sparkle no matter how pitch-black it is! The 22nd mainline installment in the Pretty Cure franchise.

1.SummaryEnglish: Uta Sakura lives in Hanamichi Town. One day while on a walk, she meets a fairy named Purirun. Purirun has come in search of Kirakiland’s savior called Idol Precure.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Queen of Kirakiland, Pikarine, tells Uta about Team Chokkiri and their boss, Darkine. Meanwhile, Cure Idol is going viral on TV and social media as a “mysterious new idol.”

3.SummaryEnglish: Nana, who is feeling down about a mistake she made during her piano competition, is invited to Uta’s family’s home, Café Glitter. Uta and Uta’s little sister Hamori cheer her up, and she is ready to do her best at the school welcome event…

4.SummaryEnglish: Just like it did with Cure Idol, the word is spreading about Cure Wink. Meanwhile, another popular “legendary idol” Kaito Hibiki drops by Cafe Glitter.

5.SummaryEnglish: A man named Tanaka appears before Uta and Nana and says he knows they're Idol Precures. Meanwhile, a message arrives that says, “I want to hire the Precures.”

6.SummaryEnglish: Uta and Nana get to know Kokoro Shigure, president of the Cure Idol and Cure Wink Research Club. Purirun wants to become friends with Kokoro and follows her after school.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kokoro is shocked to see Cure Idol and Cure Wink battle the Makkuranda, and runs away, saying “I can’t do that!” She tries to forget about the Idol Precures that she loves by putting away all her merchandise and dancing her troubles away, but…

8.SummaryEnglish: Kokoro says she wants to study Cure Idol and Cure Wink, so they decide to have a sleepover at Uta’s house.

9.SummaryEnglish: On their way home from school, Nana suddenly begins acting strangely. When she continues to say and do strange things, Uta and Kokoro start to count the “Seven Wonders of Nana.”

10.SummaryEnglish: The Idol Precure songs are being made into a CD, so Cure Idol and the others start recording. But Cure Kyun-Kyun is so nervous that she can’t sing well.

11.SummaryEnglish: Inspired by the school broadcast, Uta and the others begin to think about their dreams for the future. To help Uta, who is having trouble deciding, Nana and Kokoro begin “Uta’s Dream Search Project.”

12.SummaryEnglish: A new arrival to Hanamichi Town from Kirakiland is discovered. Purirun says it’s Meroron, and Uta and her friends go searching for them.

13.SummaryEnglish: Uta and her friends form a girls volleyball team for the school ball-game tournament. On her team is Wakaba, a member of the official school team. She’s in love with Shota, another volleyball player, and declares that she’ll tell him her feelings if they win.

14.TitleEnglish: Dear Mom, A Message from Kokoro
14.SummaryEnglish: Kokoro’s mother has to work despite it being the weekend, and Kokoro sees her off. Kokoro buys her a carnation for Mother’s Day and has trouble coming up with a good message for the card, so she drops by Cafe Glitter to get some advice.

15.TitleEnglish: Operation Make Sissy Fall In Love
15.SummaryEnglish: Meroron is jealous of Purirun’s relationship with Uta, so Uta and the others, who also want to be closer with Meroron, encourage Purirun to spend more time with Meroron. Purirun invites Meroron to dress in matching outfits and go on a date.

16.TitleEnglish: Full Bloom! Intensive Practice! Hanamichi Town Festival!
16.SummaryEnglish: Idol Precure is invited to appear at the Hanamichi Town Festival. Uta and the others want to make the event a success, so they ask Tanaka to help them make an intensive practice regimen.

17.TitleEnglish: Purirun's Decision! Let's go to Kirakiland!
17.SummaryEnglish: Purirun desperately wants to help Uta and decides to go to Kirakiland with Meroron. Meanwhile, Uta and the others are preparing to go on stage at the Hanamichi Town Festival.

18.TitleEnglish: Who Are You? Zukyoon Through My Heart!
18.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious duo has suddenly appeared: Cure Zukyoon and Cure Kiss. Uta wakes up in the middle of a dream about Cure Zukyoon, and even at school her head is full of Cure Zukyoon all day. Kokoro sees this and determines that Uta has become a fan of Cure Zukyoon.

19.TitleEnglish: The Pair's Vow! Cure Zukyoon and Cure Kiss Debut!
19.SummaryEnglish: Cure Idol and her friends chase after Cure Zukyoon and Cure Kiss but lose sight of them. Sometime later, a magazine reporter who wants to learn the truth about the duo appears, and Uta and the others offer to help.

20.TitleEnglish: Puri! A Picnic to Find Memories!
20.SummaryEnglish: Uta and the others learn that Purirun gave up all their memories of them to become a Precure. Uta and the others invite the fairies on a picnic to try to recover Purirun’s memories.

21.SummaryEnglish: Uta, who fainted due to a cold, gets upset and cries about how Purirun’s memories aren’t returning. But once she feels better, she visits Purirun and proposes they make new memories together, and they begin taking selfies.

22.SummaryEnglish: Idol Precure and ZukyoonKiss are hired for a promotional campaign showdown at Pretty Holic. But Meroron sees Purirun’s usual carefree attitude and comes up with an idea…

23.SummaryEnglish: The Precures are asked to sign a present for a fan, and they realize they’ve never made their own signatures. At that moment, they hear the news that Kaito Hibiki has resumed his activities.

24.SummaryEnglish: When Uta and the others learn that Tanaka hasn’t taken a summer holiday in years, they offer to do his usual jobs for him so he can rest. But when faced with a sudden day off, he’s not sure what to do with himself.

25.TitleEnglish: Wink in a Field of Sunflowers
25.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to an idea from Nana, they decide to visit some sunflower fields. Nana enjoys the vast expanses of blooming sunflowers, but she can’t stop worrying about Zakkuri.

26.SummaryEnglish: They decide to create an Idol Precure and ZukyoonKiss fanclub and Kokoro works especially hard at it. While answering a question about favorite sayings for the fanclub newsletter, Kokoro remembers something from her early years.

27.TitleEnglish: Let's all have Kyun-Kyun hearts together!
27.SummaryEnglish: As the Idol Precure and ZukyoonKiss Fanclub gains momentum, Uta and the others decide to begin making videos for their fans on their CureTube channel. Then, at school check-in day during their summer holidays, Uta receives a letter.

28.SummaryEnglish: Uta and the others visit Grandpa Heji Sakura's house. They bring the family dog, Kyutaro, along and when something makes Uta feel lonely, he wants to help cheer her up.

31.TitleEnglish: Who's the Center of Idol Precure?!

34.TitleEnglish: Detective Hamorin! Solve the Mystery Menu!
